title: Google Assistant cuts me off mid-sentence every single time
content:
For the last two weeks (roughly), Google Assistant on my 4a 5G has been cutting me off in the middle of my commands every single time I use it.

I'll try to set a reminder and it'll cut off on the "in..." and then add that to the title while asking me for the time (even though I said it).

I'll try to set an alarm and it cuts off after "wake me up", and then asks me for a time (even though I said "...at X".

Weirdly, it works perfectly fine on my Nest Mini. I've changed absolutely zero settings on my devices. It just randomly started happening a couple weeks ago.

I can't actually use GA on my phone because of this issue. And I used to use it extensively, so this is incredibly frustrating.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
